com.eemi.ext4j.client.core

Class ComponentQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eemi.ext4j.client.core.ComponentQuery

  • public class ComponentQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides searching of Components within ComponentManager (globally) or a specific Container on the document with a similar syntax to a CSS selector. Returns List of matching Components, or empty List.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean is(Component component, java.lang.String selector)
      Tests whether the passed Component matches the selector string.
      static java.util.List<Component> query(java.lang.String selector)
      Returns an array of matched Components from within the passed root object.
      static java.util.List<Component> query(java.lang.String selector, Container root)
      Returns an array of matched Components from within the passed root object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • is

        public static boolean is(Component component,
         java.lang.String selector)
        Tests whether the passed Component matches the selector string.

      • query

        public static java.util.List<Component> query(java.lang.String selector)
        Returns an array of matched Components from within the passed root object.

        This method filters returned Components in a similar way to how CSS selector based DOM queries work using a textual selector string.

      • query

        public static java.util.List<Component> query(java.lang.String selector,
                              Container root)
        Returns an array of matched Components from within the passed root object.

        This method filters returned Components in a similar way to how CSS selector based DOM queries work using a textual selector string.
